name: Laguna Honda Hospital and Rehabilitation Center
description: Laguna Honda offers long term care and rehabilitation services with a physician on site 24 hours a day. All Laguna Honda patients or residents are assigned a primary care physician who follows their progress closely, providing personalized and comprehensive services.
fullDescription: Laguna Honda offers long term care and rehabilitation services with a physician on site 24 hours a day. All Laguna Honda patients or residents are assigned a primary care physician who follows their progress closely, providing personalized and comprehensive services.
whatTheyOffer: Laguna Honda offers long term care and rehabilitation services with a physician on site 24 hours a day. All Laguna Honda patients or residents are assigned a primary care physician who follows their progress closely, providing personalized and comprehensive services.
address: 375 Laguna Honda Blvd, San Francisco, CA, 94116
